issue.title: aa.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://aa.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Faa.com)
### Comment
> Many of the sub menus in the American Airlines app on Android 15 do not work when dns.adguard.com is being used.  For example, opening the app, then selecting account details such that "Rewards/Promotions/Travel Credits" is displayed at the bottom, then swiping up on this screen and clicking "Your activity" results in the error "Unable to load menu".  The error is not present with standard DNS being used.

comment.body:
It seems that it's related to - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/179278 and required rule is not available in optimized filter list for Android.
Could you please add this rule:
```adblock
@@||turramusic.com.au^$xmlhttprequest,elemhide,jsinject,extension
```
to user rules and then check if issue still occurs?
On my Android device it fixes the problem.

comment.body:
Hi Alex, I can repro on multiple Android devices.
Note, that the image flashing only occurs on their 'collections' pages, and not on the main page. I've recorded a video as screenshots do not give a complete overview of the problem.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/41e043f7-47cf-4b73-a35e-bbc0e10d96f6



I've tried disabling:

- tracking protection - no change
- ad blocking - no change
- annoyance blocking - no change
- DNS protection - no change
- Firewall - no change
- Browsing Security - no change

The only way I have found to mitigate the issue is either disable AG or add _www.turramusic.com.au_ to Website allowlist.

I've grabbed some Debug logs as well.
[adguard_logs_4.6.207_0312_131246.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17988832/adguard_logs_4.6.207_0312_131246.zip)
